snippet: Ozzie Guillen and Carlos Zambrano have been friends. Now, they're part of the same team.
abstract: Ozzie Guillen and Carlos Zambrano have been friends. Now, they're part of the same team.
lead_paragraph: At Carlos Zambrano's lowest moments in the major leagues, Ozzie Guillen has been there. In June 2010, after a dugout fight with a teammate during a game against the White Sox, Zambrano had dinner with Guillen. Last August, after Zambrano packed his belongings and left the Cubs during a game in Atlanta, Guillen's wife spoke with him and Guillen publicly called Zambrano his friend.
